overview.heading: Gainesville Virtual Office
overview.body: Elevate your business with an esteemed Gainesville address without the financial burden of a permanent workspace. With Opus VO, you have the opportunity to position your enterprise right in Gainesville’s thriving environment. And when face-to-face meetings are a must, you can take advantage of our fully-equipped conference rooms.  Opting for a virtual office in Gainesville through Opus VO also provides you with a dedicated live receptionist. Your brand’s unique identity will be upheld with the quality customer service we deliver, allowing you to focus on your business’s growth. Let us manage the day-to-day tasks like call handling and mail services, so you can zero in on what truly matters.

faqs.question: Can I receive mail under my company name and personal name?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can receive mail under both once your account has been activated.

faqs.question: Do you use an automated phone service or a receptionist to answer?
faqs.answer: We offer a live, personalized receptionist to transfer your calls during business hours Monday to Friday. Calls made after hours will be met with a professional voicemail.

faqs.question: Can I have a virtual office in Gainesville, Florida even if I don’t reside there?
faqs.answer: Yes, and it is a fantastic way to expand your presence to new clients. It will build trust with residents by having your business in the heart of Gainesville. You can also adapt to better meet your clients’ unique needs within Florida.

faqs.question: What do you mean by “all-inclusive services”?
faqs.answer: Our Gainesville virtual office offerings include all features listed at the same monthly cost, regardless of the location you choose. Please note that mail centers and some premium locations may not include all options. If you would like additional information, you can compare Opus to our competitors or contact us.

sections.title: Get a Gainesville Virtual Office
sections.body: Opus VO at Gainesville @ 9200 NW 39th Avenue, Gainesville, FL 32606  Don’t underestimate Gainesville—it’s more than just a college town. It’s an expanding center for tech, healthcare, and education. Our Gainesville location offers you direct access to essential industry contacts and relevant networking opportunities.  By selecting an Opus VO virtual office in Gainesville, you’re not just reducing costs—you’re gaining a crucial edge over your competitors. Tap into our top-notch virtual office services today and watch your business reach new heights.
